subject: Re: [junit] web_based test client using database
msgSnippet: Without doing your design for you?  Seriously, search the archive for web based testing client.  You will probably find something there. Also, look at Vlad s
messageBody:
Without doing your design for you? Seriously, search the archive for
web based testing client. You will probably find something there.
Also, look at Vlad's recent posts about a specialized TestListener. You
could capture all of this in the Listener.

=jason

On Mon, 2002-07-01 at 07:21, sudipto chattopadhyay wrote: i'm trying to
design a web based testing client using junit, where
all results are stored in database. this client will be helpfull
for mainly regrassion test. can anybody give me some idea about
the structure of that database and how to incorporate the the
testresult, testsuit name, and testcases log in tha database ?? if
there is any example of such client plz. tell me .

Sudipto
